description: This file contains utility functions for splitting strings into tokens and storing them in a linked list. It defines the 'SplitUtils' object with methods to split a string on spaces and validate tokens.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string splitting utilities.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a source string into tokens separated by spaces and returns them as a linked list.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid.

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks whether a token is valid (non-empty).
